name: JoinLogic
description:
This game is incomplete and missing features.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left Click & Drag - Connect Nodes (requires line-of-sight)

Right Click - Remove Connection from Node

Note: Connections are directional. The output of the node you drag from will be the input of the node you're dragging to. Some nodes are input only, some are output only. Others are logic gates.
